name: MiMiMiShKa
description:
Meet beautiful girls and spend time in their company dealing with scattered pieces of their memories. You will meet with such girls as Maria, who is 24 years old, another girlfriend Helena, who is 22 and other girls from 19 to 25.

The game is a classic puzzle. You have to go through all ten stages, as well as three levels of difficulty, in which pleasant surprises await you ;-)

- Puzzle Game

- Artworks

- Nice music

- Steam achievements

Keyboard H: Complete Level
